name: Brussels Sprouts with Bacon and Balsamic
author: JW
summary: Delicious glazed sprouts. Our family loves them with lots of bacon. While we do enjoy them prepared lighter, this is a great quick side dish for a special meal. Also perfect for holiday get-togethers.
ingredients: 2 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise
6 slices bacon, or more to taste, thinly sliced
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
⅔ cup reduced balsamic vinegar, divided
directions: Combine Brussels sprouts and bacon in a cast iron skillet; season with salt and pepper
Cook, stirring occasionally, until Brussels sprouts start to brown, 15 to 20 minutes
Drizzle 1/2 cup of balsamic vinegar on top
Transfer Brussels sprouts and bacon to a serving platter; drizzle remaining balsamic vinegar on top
